Game rules

Hello and welcome to this simple but funny game. Before you start to play, please, read the rules of game carefully!

  1. The firts, you will see a field with cards that are upside-down
  2. Your should find cards with the same pictures for 30 seconds
  3. You can turn two cards one by one by clicking on them
  4. If you find the same card you get 1 score, if you find all cards at the set time - you win
  5. If you don't, please, don't be upset and try again.
  6. Are you ready?
